name: Adventure in the Hall of Order
name_original: Adventure in the Hall of Order
description:
Welcome to Adventure in the Hall of Order !
In the hall of order you lead a party of brave heroes and help them to defeat all  reatures in each room.

But you don't control what they do, only where they are doing it!

Mac users: to play the game you have to disable "prevent cross-site tracking" in Safari preferences.
